sf169:5: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatād avatīrṇo rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāviśat |
sf169:6: tena khalu samayenācelakāśyapo rājagṛhaṁ gocarāya prasṛto ’bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena | adrākṣīd acelakāśyapo bhagavantaṁ dūrata eva | dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma | upetya bhagavantam idam avocat |
sf169:7: pṛcchāma bho gautama kañcid eva pradeśam | saced avakāśaṁ kuryāt praśnasya vyākaraṇāya |
sf169:8: akālas tāvat tava kāśyapa praśnasya vyākaraṇāya | rājagṛhaṁ tāvat piṇḍāya caritavyam | bahir ārāmaṁ gaccha | tatra te kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya |
sf169:10: trir apy acelakāśyapo bhagavantam idam avocat | syād bho gautamāsmākaṁ vāntarāyo bhavati gautamasyānyathātvam | ihaiva vayaṁ bhavantaṁ gautamaṁ pṛcchāmaḥ | saced avakāśaṁ kuryāḥ praśnasya vyākaraṇāya |
sf169:12: kin nu bho gautama svayaṁkṛtaṁ duḥkham | avyākṛtam idaṁ mayā kāśyapa svayaṁkṛtaṁ duḥkham |
sf169:13: kin nu bho gautama parakṛtaṁ duḥkham | etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṁ mayā parakṛtaṁ duḥkham |
sf169:14: kin nu bho gautama svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca duḥkham | etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṁ mayā svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca duḥkham |
sf169:15: kin nu bho gautama asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ duḥkham | etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṁ mayā asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ duḥkham |
sf169:16: kin nu bho gautama svayaṁkṛtaṁ duḥkham iti pṛṣṭo ’vyākṛtam iti vadasi parakṛtaṁ svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ duḥkham iti pṛṣṭo ’vyākṛtam iti vadasi | kin nu bho gautama nāsty eva duḥkham |
sf169:17: na kāśyapa nāsty eva duḥkham iti tv asty eva duḥkham |
sf169:18: sādhu me bhavān gautamas tathā dharmaṁ deśayatu yathāhaṁ duḥkhaṁ jāneyaṁ duḥkhaṁ paśyeyam |
sf169:19: sā eva kāśyapa vedanā sa vettīti yasyaivaṁ syāt svayaṁkṛtaṁ duḥkham evam ahaṁ na vadāmi |
sf169:20: anyā vedanā anyo vettīti yasyaivaṁ syāt parakṛtaṁ duḥkham evam ahaṁ na vadāmi |
sf169:21: vedanābhibhūtasyaivā sataḥ pare duḥkhaṁ samavadadhatīti yasyaivaṁ syāt svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca duḥkham evam apy ahaṁ na vadāmi |
sf169:22: asatsu ca pratyayeṣu duḥkhāni santīti yasyaivaṁ syād asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ duḥkham evam ahaṁ na vadāmi |
sf169:23: ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya madhyamayā pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṁ deśayati | yad utāsmin satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate pūrvavad yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati |
sf169:24: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe ’celakāśyapasya virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam |
sf169:25: athācelakāśyapo dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso ’parapratyayo ’nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpto yena bhagavāṁs tenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat |
sf169:26: abhikkrānto ’haṁ bhadanta abhikkrāntaḥ | eṣo ’haṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca | upāsākaṁ ca māṁ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam |
sf169:27: athācelakāśyapo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
sf169:28: athācelakāśyapo ’ciraprakrānto bhagavato ’ntikād gavā taruṇavatsayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ | tasya maraṇasamaye viprasannānīndriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavarṇaḥ paryavadātas tvagvarṇaḥ |
sf169:29: atha saṁbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāviśan | aśrauṣuḥ saṁbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaḥ | yo ’sāv acelakāśyapo bhagavantaṁ rājagṛhe praśnaṁ pṛṣṭavān so ’ciraprakrānto bhagavato ’ntikād gavā taruṇavatsayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ | tasya maraṇasamaye viprasannānīndriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavarṇaḥ paryavadātas tvagvarṇaḥ |
sf169:30: śrutvā ca punā rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātaṁ pratikrāntāḥ | pātracīvaraṁ pratiśamya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagmuḥ | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdan | ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṁbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan |
sf169:31: iha vayaṁ bhadanta saṁbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāviśāma | aśrauṣma vayaṁ saṁbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaḥ pūrvavad yāvat paryavadātas tvagvarṇaḥ | tasya bhadanta kā gatiḥ kopapattiḥ ko ’bhisaṁparāyaḥ |
sf169:32: dravyajātīyaḥ sa bhikṣavaḥ kulaputraḥ | pratyabhijñāsīc ca me dharmeṣv anudharmam | na ca me viheṭhitavān dharmādhikārikīṁ kathāṁ vyākṛtāṁ sa kulaputraḥ | kuruta tasya śarīre śarīrapūjām iti |
sf169:33: tatra bhagavān acelakāśyapaṁ paramaṁ vyākaraṇam akārṣīt ||
